alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 2:28PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Ojai Valley and Central Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM PST Wednesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley
